Header: Two gramaseva officers arrested with ivory pendants (Photos)
Content: Police have arrested 2 gramaseva officers who had in their possession 3 pendants which were made with ivory. The suspects were arrested this evening (02) following a tip-off received by Nikawaratiya Division's Intelligence Unit. They were arrested in Polpithigama. The 2 gramaseva officers have been arrested based on information provided by the suspects who are in remand custody over the killing of 'Dala Poottuwa' tusker. The suspects will be produced before Mahawa Magistrate tomorrow.
